title: Find the ratio of $$a_2$$ to $$a_1$$.
text: The ratio of the second term to the first term is $$\frac{\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{3}{4}}=\frac{2}{3}$$.

title: Find the ratio of $$a_3$$ to $$a_2$$.
text: The ratio of the third term to the second term is $$\frac{\frac{1}{3}}{\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{2}{3}$$.

title: Determining if there is a Constant Ratio
text: Since $$\frac{2}{3}=\frac{2}{3}$$, there is a common ratio, the series is geometric.

title: Sum of Infinite Geometric Series
text: Since $$-1<\frac{2}{3}<1$$ is T, then sum is defined.
